name: Hardest "Walker, Texas Ranger" Quiz | Texas Ranger Walker | 15 Questions

questions.text: Where was the first place Trivette saw Walker?
questions.explanation:
during the riots.

	Walker and Trivette met at the pool, but, as Walker lie in a coma, Trivette remembered seeing him during the riots.  This was seen on the episode 'Til Death Do Us Part'.

questions.text: When Alex and Walker first met, how many men had he arrested?
questions.explanation:
seven.

	Alex: "You'll have us believe you arrested seven men all by yourself?"  Walker: "Yes. Ask them. Who arrested you?" (asking the men on trial)  Seven men: "You did!"

questions.text: What holiday was going on when Walker and Alex first kissed at CD's Bar and Grill?
In "One Riot, One Ranger", what did Walker say his horse's name was?
questions.explanation:
Cookie.

	In later episodes the only horse you hear him talking about is Amigo.

questions.text: Which country music performer did not appear on the show?
questions.explanation:
Reba McEntire.

	Lee Greenwood, Lila McCann, Michael Peterson, Collin Raye and Tracy Lawrence sang on the show.

questions.text: What familial term has Trivette referred to Walker as?
What did Walker and Alex name their daughter?
questions.explanation:
Angela.

	While Walker was asleep, an angel showed him his daughter's life from childhood to her teenage years.  Hence the name Angela. His little angel.

questions.text: How many of Trivette's cars were destroyed during the series?
questions.explanation:
4.

	He drove his red car into the ocean in "Something in the Shadows",  a truck hit his green Mustang in "Angel"  and a grenade that Gage kicked under the car blew his other green Mustang up in 'Wedding Bells'. Trivette's final car was blown up in "The Final Show/Down".

questions.text: Sydney's sister showed up in Dallas.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Gage's sister showed up in Dallas.

questions.text: Throughout the series, all the characters went without injury.
questions.explanation:
No.

	Walker has been shot, knifed, mauled by a bear, drugged, and blinded by a bomb. Trivette has been hit by a car twice, shot in the chest, and nearly drowned. CD has been shot, knifed and beaten. Alex has been shot in the arm and back, assaulted by a mad man three times, and nearly drowned. Gage has lost his hearing in an explosion and been mauled by a bear. Sydney has been shot.

Yes.

	They thought he died of a heart attack, but it turns out he was poisoned.

questions.text: Trivette calls the feeling that Walker gets the 'Cherokee feeling'.
questions.explanation:
True.

	When Walker gets a gut feeling about a case, Trivette calls it 'Cherokee feeling'. Trivette even went as far as to tell a reporter about Walker's Cherokee feelings. During 'The Fighting McLain's', Trivette told Walker he thought he was part Cherokee.

questions.text: Which young actor played Lucas in the two part episode by the same name?
questions.explanation:
Haley Joel Osment.

	Haley Joel Osment played Cole Sear in 'The Sixth Sense' with co-star Bruce Willis in 1999. The other young actors listed in this MC are from the movie 'Cheaper By The Dozen'.

questions.text: Who did CD and Walker take snipe hunting?
questions.explanation:
Trivette.

	"Cuckaroo! Cuckaroo! Biddy Biddy Boo!" Trivette calling a snipe.
